1.description: The first and best all girls surf camp in Nicaragua. ChicaBrava is an elite camp for adventurous women who appreciate comfort as well as challenge.  The brand new Chica Brava shop is situated opposite the beach, selling rash guards, t-shirts, clothing and surf accessories.  You can also rent top quality boards from her.  A must see for all the charging girls out there!
1.name: Chica Brava Surf

266.description:
Farmacia Santa Martha with more of 10 years in San Juan del Sur, always have good medicine and staff for taking care of your health while enjoy your vacations in San Juan del Sur.

Hours: Monday to Saturday 9 AM- 9 PM
           Sunday 10 AM- 6 PM
266.name: Farmacia Santa Martha

148.description:
It offers all in brand shoes, t-shirts and hats.
Hours: Monday to Saturday 10 AM - 7 PM
           Sunday                     10 AM - 5 PM

155.description:
It offers beauty salon service with specially in Tech Italy Products.

284.description:
It's a small store which sales exclusively the most popular brand in San Juan del sur - San Juan Surf - Look for your t-shirt, tank top, hat, or coffee cup at this place with the best colors and designs.

Also find the best supplies in town for a nice surf experience. 

Hours: Monday to Sunday 8 AM- 9 PM
284.name: San Juan Surf Store

157.description:

Hours: Monday to Sunday 9 AM- 6 PM

It's an store in town exclusively for those who want something different, bohemian with a romantic and casual design. 

---They are closed on Tuesday but if you want to check something as in the Reception at HC Suite Hotel next to it.

Hours: Wednesday to Monday 10 AM- 6 PM

159.description:
It offers clothes and accessories for children, with the best brand.

160.description:
Larger upstairs gym that besides regular equipment, also offers personal training in boxing, karate, kick boxing, jiujit su, and fitness. Hosts the occasional Fight Night.


Hours: 
Monday: Friday 6am-1pm / 4pm-8pm
Saturday: 6am-1pm
Sunday: 8am-12pm

168.description:
Arribas bar is a lively spot, always playing great music and giving you some of the best deals on drinks and atmosphere.  Located right on the beach front so you can sink your feet into the sand whilst sinking your cocktails.  Make sure to go here during your visit!
Located approximately 100 metres to the right of El Timon restaurant (if facing the sea).

Hours: Monday to Sunday 11 AM- 2 AM
168.name: Arribas Bar

41.description:
It's offers all in American Clothes & cosmetics. Visit them right in front of Barrio Cafe, San Juan del sur. Personal attention.
Hours: Monday to Sunday 9 AM - 6 PM

It offers a variety of personal accessories. Personal attention guaranteed.

180.description:
It's an small store where you can find handicraft and different kind of souvenirs to remember your vacations in our beautiful country.

Hours: Monday to Sunday 9 AM- 6 PM
180.name: Tu Estilo

183.description:
Having the LOVE for the Surf, the Sun, the Sand – and YOUR HAIR that comes with it, BRUSH YOUR HAIR – a Ladies and Gents Hair Salon was Created & Born in 2009 – by Justin Bobby Brescia, Celebrity & stylist. Original location California, and now also New York – The NICARAGUAN Salon was built in 2013. Taken into the Creative Genius hands of Natasha Lazdins, an Award winning Australian hairstylist.
At BRUSH, we offer ALL hair – styling, cutting, colouring and expertise knowledge – Sunkissed or not.. and haircare with OUR OWN EXCLUSIVE  BRUSH Organic Raw Vegan Products.
We combined a mission to promote wellbeing, Love and all the Care YOU need for your hair, lifestyle & travels ORGANICALLY with WICKED Style 

Hours: Monday to Sunday
183.name: Brush Your Hair

192.description:
Offering clothes for women, men, boys and girls, with more of twenty year of service to customers, also have a variety of staff for you fishing adventure.

Hours: Mon-Sat:	8:30 am-6:00 am
Sunday 8:30 am-12:00 pm
192.name: Variedades Gaby Mar

Hours: Monday to Sunday 7 AM- 10 PM
